definition: down/downwards/below/lower/later/next (week etc)/second (of two parts)/to decline/to go down/to arrive at (a decision, conclusion etc)/measure word to show the frequency of an action
in a fit of pique/in a fury
lit. when the nest is upset no egg is left intact (idiom)/fig. when one falls in disgrace the whole family is doomed
pinyin: fu4 chao2 zhi1 xia4 wu2 wan2 luan3

sentences.english: Mr Fukuda, by contrast, has a family legacy to enshrine.
sentences.chinese: 相比之下，福田康夫有參拜神廟的家庭傳統。

sentences.english: Sneaking out may seem like a real option in the heat of anger.
sentences.chinese: 盛怒之下，偷偷溜出去看上去似乎是真正的解決之道。

sentences.english: Surprisingly, after chewing it for a bit, he found it sweetish and rather pleasant.
sentences.chinese: 當下伸手接過，咬了一口，咀嚼之下，倒也甘美可口。

sentences.english: But he is also under the gun from lawmakers over Bank Century.
sentences.chinese: 但是他也處於世紀銀行調查的槍口之下。

sentences.english: By contrast, the United States is strong in these areas.
sentences.chinese: 相形之下，美國在這些方面實力雄厚。

sentences.english: Your sink should have two cut-off valves under it.
sentences.chinese: 您的水槽應該有二個停汽閥在它之下。

sentences.english: Animated by fresh hops , he started again .
sentences.chinese: 他在新希望的激勵之下，又從頭做起。

sentences.english: By contrast, unhappy people watched significantly more television in their spare time.
sentences.chinese: 相比之下，不幸福的人業餘時間很明顯地多看電視。

sentences.english: Even the most handsome boy can be buried in her wake.
sentences.chinese: 即使是最帥的男孩也會倒在她的裙底之下。

sentences.english: In comparison, the Earth orbits at just 1 AU.
sentences.chinese: 相比之下，地球軌道只是一個天文單位。

sentences.english: He killed the man in a blind fury.
sentences.chinese: 他一怒之下把那人殺了。

sentences.english: Are you hiding away, lost Under the sewers.
sentences.chinese: 你不斷的在躲藏嗎，是遺落在陰溝之下。

sentences.english: Might as well be in a cloud.
sentences.chinese: 雲彩的勢力之下也一樣皎潔。

sentences.english: Under his rule, the first feature is not yet Xing Ming.
sentences.chinese: 在他的統治之下，第一個特色便是尚刑名。

sentences.english: Several dead bodies lay under the portrait of Mao on Tiananmen Gate.
sentences.chinese: 幾具屍體放置在毛之下畫象在天安門門。

sentences.english: Black ant cant stand stimulation in a pet like the giant killer.
sentences.chinese: 黑蟻受不了激，一氣之下就想對擎天下殺手。

definition: down/downwards/below/lower/later/next (week etc)/second (of two parts)/to decline/to go down/to arrive at (a decision, conclusion etc)/measure word to show the frequency of an action
of/~'s (possessive particle)/(used after an attribute)/(used to form a nominal expression)/(used at the end of a declarative sentence for emphasis)
and/as well as/and so/but (not)/yet (not)/(indicates causal relation)/(indicates change of state)/(indicates contrast)
to hit (the mark)/to be hit by/to suffer/to win (a prize, a lottery)
also/too/(in Classical Chinese) final particle implying affirmation
behind/at the back/in the rear/behind sb's back
